content.html: In this #dcldn21 talk, @teresa_wyy will talk about the "API-First" concept and discuss the important aspects of #API design from the FE engineer's view, including URL structure, #HTTP method, #JSON syntax, and the flow of API-First design. Full abstract: london.droidcon.com/program/api-de…
content.value:
In this #dcldn21 talk, @teresa_wyy will talk about the "API-First" concept and discuss the important aspects of #API design from the FE engineer's view, including URL structure, #HTTP method, #JSON syntax, and the flow of API-First design.

Full abstract: london.droidcon.com/program/api-de…
